text: Wͻn a wͻ’sakra wͻn adwen, wͻn a wͻ’som (Nyame), wͻn a wͻyi (Nyame) ayε, wͻn a wͻ’kyiri akyiriwia, wͻn a wͻ’bͻ wͻn mu ase (ma Nyame), wͻn a wͻ’de wͻn anim butu fͻm (ma Nyame), wͻn a wͻ’hyε (amanfoͻ) ma w’ͻdi dwuma pa, na wͻ’bra (amanfoͻ) amumuyε, ne wͻn a wͻ’hwε Nyankopͻn mmra no so yie. (Nkͻmhyεni), fa (Ɔsoro aheman no mu) anigyesεm no hyԑ agyidiefoͻ no bᴐ
